Brainrot Bot & Reddit-TTS-Bot

May 2024

Jackson Eshbaugh

I created a Python module that scrapes stories from subreddits and creates YouTube Shorts-style videos with text-to-speech narration. The module is called Reddit-TTS-Bot (available on PyPI), and I used it to create a simple driver project called Brainrot Bot.

If you want to see more of this project...

Brainrot Bot GitHub Reddit-TTS-Bot GitHub

Jackson Eshbaugh is a computer science and French student at Lafayette College in Easton, PA. He is passionate about technology, language, and their intersection as well as bioinformatics, the intersection of computer science and biology.
